review: I bought this to reduce constant use of ps3. Disappointed that I cannot use the remote for many of the games. Price of game controller ridiculous. Also purchased a remote control app for third party apps that is not compatible with kindle fire, so wasted $1.99 I will never get back. Also had to buy a WiFi remote for third party apps. Still better than paying for cable, but really if you have a game system that allows you to access Netflix, Hulu, etc...save your money.
